description: React component for the Leaderboard page, displaying all-time and last 30 days standings with data normalization, error handling, and user interaction.

methods.name: normalizeLeaderboard
methods.description: Normalizes backend leaderboard response to ensure consistent data shape and handle missing or malformed data.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches leaderboard data from API, handles errors, and updates component state.
